message.body: ng distance but we are close. Let us spend more time together. Let me know what I can do.

You are my only Baha'i friend right now (other than my mom) who knows about what I am going through. I really value your input. I need to be constantly reminded of the power of prayers. It is so easy to drift. Prayer has done so much for me in the past. I just have to hold fast now and to remember...i will try to come and see you whenever I can.
